select from profile where sta!='A' and (sta !='N' or sta is null) and guestno in (select guestno from prh_master where house_id in (select id from pr_house where estate_id=#{sta} ))
and CLASS= #{cla,jdbcType=CHAR}
and company LIKE concat(concat('%',#{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
and name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')

select from profile where sta!='A' and (sta !='N' or sta is null) and guestno in (select guestno from prh_master where house_id in (select id from pr_house where estate_id=#{sta} ))
and CLASS= #{cla,jdbcType=CHAR}
and company LIKE concat(concat('%',#{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
and name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')

select from profile where sta!='A' and (sta !='N' or sta is null)
and CLASS= #{cla,jdbcType=CHAR}
and company LIKE concat(concat('%',#{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
and name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')

select
from PROFILE where class = 'C' and sta='I' and estate_id=#{0} and sta!='A'
select p.name from profile p where p.guestno in ( select guest_no from prh_master where house_id =#{houseid} and sta !=4 and sta !=9 and sta!=3)
select count(*) from profile where class='C' and sta='I' and estate_id=#{estateId}
